summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Public Library; authorizing the execution of grant agreements with the Washington State Library and with the Library of Congress to expand services to patrons of the Washington Talking Book and Braille Library, to expand Internet services to four neighborhood library sites, and to develop a program to support "literary heritage" programming; and increasing the expenditure allowance in the 1995 budget of the Library Department.
committee: Health, Human Services, Education and Libraries
